Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at  Belmont/Lamon
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Cicero, Addison, Laramie and Belmont due to police activity near Belmont/Lamon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Cicero, Addison, Laramie, then resume their normal route on Belmont due to police activity near Belmont/Lamon.

Allow extra travel time.
